hero.title: Stan Smits
hero.description: I am a driven professional with a strong foundation in Computer Science and Web Development, specializing in creating seamless experiences for users. With a background in customer service and public engagement, I combine technical expertise with exceptional interpersonal skills to deliver innovative and personalized solutions.

computerScience.title: Computer Science
computerScience.description: Specialized in software engineering and computer science.

highSchool.title: High School (HAVO)
highSchool.description: Graduated with a strong foundation in mathematics and science.

bio.title: BIO (BOA in training)
bio.description: Ensuring a safe, clean, and pleasant public environment in Amsterdam by collaborating with residents and enforcing regulations where needed.

enforcer.title: Public Space Enforcer
enforcer.description: Tasked with maintaining public safety and enforcing municipal regulations, ensuring a safe and pleasant environment for all residents and visitors in Amsterdam. This role involves patrolling public spaces, handling disputes, and promoting community engagement.

driver.title: Delivery Driver
driver.description: Delivered packages to customers in a timely and professional manner, ensuring that all items arrived safely and on time. Responsibilities included planning routes, loading and unloading vehicles, and providing excellent customer service.

installer.title: Heat Pump Installer
installer.description: Installed and maintained heat pumps for residential and commercial clients, ensuring that systems were operating efficiently and safely. Responsibilities included diagnosing issues, performing repairs, and providing excellent customer service.

specialist.title: Specialist
specialist.description: Provided a unique, personalized experience to every customer, embodying Apple's standard of excellence. Responsibilities included greeting guests, understanding their needs, and offering tailored solutions to enhance their interaction with Apple products and services.

customerService.title: Customer Service Representative
customerService.description: Delivered exceptional customer service by resolving issues, ensuring satisfaction, and contributing to process improvements to enhance the shopping experience.

allRound.title: All-round Employee
allRound.description: Performed a variety of tasks, including customer service, restocking, and cashiering, to ensure the store ran smoothly and customers received the best possible service.

calculator.title: Wage Calculator
calculator.description: Quick way to calculate the amount of pay that I'd receive while working at Amazon.

meta.title: Stan Smits - Software Developer & Public Safety Professional
meta.description: Professional portfolio of Stan Smits, showcasing expertise in Computer Science, Web Development, and Public Safety.
